Class PriorSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • PriorSampler

  • public class PriorSampler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class implementing the Prior-Sample algorithm from AIMA Section 14.5.1.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected BayesianNetwork bn
      The BayesianNetwork being sampled by this PriorSampler.
      protected java.util.Random random
      The random number generator used by this PriorSampler.
      protected java.util.List<RandomVariable> variables
      The topologically-sorted list of RandomVariables from the BayesianNetwork being sampled by this PriorSampler.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PriorSampler(BayesianNetwork bn)
      Construct and return a new PriorSampler for the given BayesianNetwork.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Assignment getSample()
      Returns an Assignment (event) sampled from the prior specified by the given BayesianNetwork.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] argv)
      Test driver for PriorSampler.
      protected java.lang.Object randomSampleForVariable(RandomVariable Xi, Assignment x)
      Return a random sample from P(Xi|Parents(Xi)), where the value is sampled according to the conditional distribution given the values already sampled for the variable's parent (in the given Assignment).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • bn

        protected BayesianNetwork bn
        The BayesianNetwork being sampled by this PriorSampler.

      • variables

        protected java.util.List<RandomVariable> variables
        The topologically-sorted list of RandomVariables from the BayesianNetwork being sampled by this PriorSampler.

      • random

        protected java.util.Random random
        The random number generator used by this PriorSampler. Pass a seed to the constructor to make it repeatable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PriorSampler

        public PriorSampler(BayesianNetwork bn)
        Construct and return a new PriorSampler for the given BayesianNetwork. Note that changes to the variables in the network will not be seen by the sampler (so don't do that).

    • Method Detail

      • getSample

        public Assignment getSample()
        Returns an Assignment (event) sampled from the prior specified by the given BayesianNetwork.

        Note that the pseudo-code in Figure 14.13 does not mention that the variables must be sorted in topological order (although it is mentioned in the text and was mentioned in class). We looked after that in our constructor, since it's relatively expensive to compute and you want to generate samples quickly.

      • randomSampleForVariable

        protected java.lang.Object randomSampleForVariable(RandomVariable Xi,
                                       Assignment x)
        Return a random sample from P(Xi|Parents(Xi)), where the value is sampled according to the conditional distribution given the values already sampled for the variable's parent (in the given Assignment).

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] argv)
                 throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                        org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Test driver for PriorSampler. Reads "aima-wet-grass.xml" and then generates samples (events).
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
